explanation: The objects involved in completing the task of removing the tomato from the trash in the refrigerator, putting the tomato on the table, putting the tomato that was in the trash back into the refrigerator, and putting a chilled tomato on the table are the Tomato, DishSponge, Butterfly Knife, Spoon, Fork, Cup, Plate, Bowl, Salt Shaker, Pepper Shaker, Mug, and Refrigerator.
